author: Reuters
title: Trump to convene G7 leaders in video link to discuss pandemic
description: Mr. Trump, who is head of the G7 this year, had planned to hold this year's summit at the presidential retreat of Camp David, Maryland, in June, but moved it to a virtual setting due to the virus.
content:
U.S. President Donald Trump will hold a video teleconference with G7 leaders on Thursday to coordinate national responses to the coronavirus outbreak, the White House said on Tuesday.
Mr. Trump, who is head of the G7 this year, had planned to hold this year'… [+984 chars]
